education.degree: Diploma of Professional Studies in Technical Support
Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

highlights.description: Plan, execute, and oversee the integration of advanced tracking technologies on the marketing website to enhance user insights and performance analytics.
Design and lead the implementation of data stitching solutions to deliver comprehensive insights into the user journey.
Extract, analyze, and visualize marketing performance data to provide actionable insights and support pipeline growth.
Drive the adoption of innovative tracking solutions to meet business objectives while ensuring regulatory compliance.
Conduct thorough assessments of data tracking technologies to maintain strict compliance with data protection regulations.
Lead web analytics measurement planning for different web assets.
Implement web analytics tracking technologies and ensure data accuracy and data integrity, including cookie consent implementations.
Build dashboards visualizing buisiness KPIs & OKRs related to marketing efforts.
Implement data stitching solutions to offer 360 view of the user journey.
Analyze data tracking technologies to ensure compliance with data protection laws.
Lead web analytics measurement planning for clients to build a the most stuitable technology stack for tracking.
Implemented web analytics tracking technologies for clients and ensured data accuracy, data integrity, including cookie consent implementations.
Built dashboards visualizing business KPIs & OKRs related to marketing & product.
Analyzed existing tracking implementations to ensure data is being captured correctlty avoid tracking debt.
Consulted with external teams to provide strategic input on measuing SEO & Paid Advertising effects on KPIs.
Built dashboards and delivered monthly, cross-channel performance reports with actionable insights.
Implemented web tracking to measure business KPIs using Google Tag Manager, Segment, Mixpanel, and Google Analytics (Universal Analytics & GA4)
Analyzed web tracking implementations and optimized inefficiencies for better data fidelity and accuracy.
Lead the migration to Google Analytics 4 for several implementations including E-commerce measurements.
Collected requirements and lead the implementation of new tracking technologies for clients to improve product and user analytics.
Monitored performance across the different customer touchpoints using web analytics platforms.
Generated user-focused content to help customers in their onboarding and nurture them to reduce churn.
Planned data-driven retention strategies as well as partnerships to expand and main user base.
Created, and documented new processes to faster access to relevant data across teams.
Automated monotonous tasks for faster results and better time efficiency for the team.
Increased the company's click-through rate by 30% through boosting organic ranking using technical and on-page Search Engine Optimization techniques.
Increased the engagement site wide through on-page Search Engine Optimization techniques as well as user-centric content.
Worked with the developers to implement a mobile-first design and development approach.
Monitored and optimized website speed, content indexation and other company KPIs.
